page.title: 06EDUCATION IN PATCHWAY
page.content: In our area there are{7 schools.}One is a secondry, 2 are primary,2 Infant and 2 juniors.Most have computers and hope to grow in the next 15 years or so. All schools start around 9am and finish around 3:30pm.Patchway High has pupils aged 11 to 18 but they can leave at 16. Infants start school in the year in which they are five . There are{3 preschool playgroups in the area. Most have 25 pupils and around 5 leaders and meet part time only . { Adult education}has many interesting classes taking place in Patchway High School including computing, keep fit, languages, dress making,and karate. They are run by the Avon County Council. At{Leyland riding {school}there are 50 horses. There are {two private ballet schools.}They both provide ballet,tap and modern lessons.
